import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { useRef } from "react"; import { UserContext } from "../context/UserContext"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { db } from "../firebase-config"; import { setDoc, doc } from "firebase/firestore"; export default function SignUp() { const { currentUser, signUp } = useContext(UserContext); const [validation, setValidation] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); const inputs = useRef([]); const addInput = (el) => { if (el && !inputs.current.includes(el)) { //récupère tous les inputs inputs.current.push(el); } }; const dataPerso = useRef([]); const addDataPerso = (el) => { if (el && !dataPerso.current.includes(el)) { //récupère tous les inputs dataPerso.current.push(el); } }; const formRef = useRef(); const handleForm = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (inputs.current[1].value.length < 6) { setValidation("6 characters minimum"); return; } else if (inputs.current[1].value !== inputs.current[2].value) { setValidation("Les mots de passe ne sont pas identiques"); return; } //console.log("PRIVATE", currentUser.email); try { const email = inputs.current[0].value; const pwd = inputs.current[1].value; const cred = await signUp(email, pwd); //attend une réponse de la requete signUp dans UserContext //console.log(cred.user.email); const addUser = async () => { try { const docRef = await setDoc(doc(db, "users", cred.user.email), { name: dataPerso.current[0].value.toUpperCase(), surName: dataPerso.current[1].value.toUpperCase(), mail: email, }); } catch (e) { console.error("Error adding document: ", e); } }; addUser(); formRef.current.reset(); navigate("/private/account/"); } catch {} }; return ( <>
